metadata.description: This module configures Routing Intent for a Virtual Hub.
Required. Name of the Virtual Hub
Required. Forward Private traffic to the Azure firewall (RFC1918)
Required. orward Internet traffic to the Azure firewall (0.0.0.0/0)
